props.query: SELECT filter(uniqueCount(`entityId`), where `cluster.status` = 'green') as 'Green', filter(uniqueCount(`entityId`), where `cluster.status` = 'yellow') as 'Yellow', filter(uniqueCount(`entityId`), where `cluster.status` = 'red') as 'Red' FROM Metric Since 1 hour ago
props.title: Cluster Status Summary

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.node.get.currentRequestsRunning`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Running Get Requests by Node

props.markdown:
::: beyond
 **Elasticsearch** 

Elasticsearch is an open source distributed document store and search engine that stores and retrieves data structures in near real-time.


:::

props.query: SELECT latest(`elasticsearch.cluster.shards.primaryActive`) as 'Active Primary Shards' FROM Metric
SELECT average(`elasticsearch.node.fs.ioOperations`) FROM Metric timeseries since 24 hours ago facet entityName
props.title: Total I/O Operations by Node

props.query: SELECT latest(`elasticsearch.cluster.shards.active`) as 'Active Shards in Cluster' FROM Metric
select average(`elasticsearch.node.indexing.documentsCurrentlyIndexing`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Documents Currently Being Indexed by Node

props.query: SELECT filter(uniqueCount(`index.health`), where `index.health` = 'green') as 'Green', filter(uniqueCount(`index.health`), where `index.health` = 'yellow') as 'Yellow', filter(uniqueCount(`index.health`), where `index.health` = 'red') as 'Red' FROM Metric
props.title: Index Health Summary

props.query: SELECT latest(`elasticsearch.index.rollup.docsCount`) as 'Docs in Primary Shards', latest(`elasticsearch.index.rollup.docsDeleted`) as 'Docs Deleted in Primary Shards' FROM Metric
props.title: Primary Doc Summary

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.node.indexing.documentsIndexed`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Total Documents Indexed by Node

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.index.docs`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Number of Documents by Index

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.node.indexing.totalDocumentsDeleted`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Total Documents Deleted by Node

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.node.indexing.docsCurrentlyDeleted`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Documents Currently Being Deleted by Node

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.elasticsearch.index.docsDeleted`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Number of Deleted Documents by Index

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.node.indexing.timeDeletingDocumentsInMilliseconds`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Time Spent Deleting Documents by Node

props.query: select average(`elasticsearch.node.indexing.timeIndexingDocumentsInMilliseconds`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Time Spent Indexing Documents by Node

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.index.primaryShards`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Number of Primary Shards by Index

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.node.index.queryCacheEvictions`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Query Cache Evictions by Node

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.node.index.queryCacheHits`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Query Cache Hits by Node

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.index.replicaShards`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Number of Replica Shards by Index

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.node.index.recoveryOngoingShardSource`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Shard Source Ongoing Recoveries by Node

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.node.merges.docsSegmentsMerging`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Doc Merges Across Segments by Node

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.index.primaryStoreSizeInBytes`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Primary Shard Store Size by Index

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.node.merges.currentActive`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Active Segment Merges by Node

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.node.merges.segmentMerges`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Total Segment Merges by Node

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.index.storeSizeInBytes`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Total Store Size by Index

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.cluster.shards.initializing`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Number of Initializing Shards

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.cluster.shards.relocating`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Number of Relocating Shards

props.query: SELECT average(`elasticsearch.cluster.shards.unassigned`) FROM Metric since 24 hours ago timeseries facet entityName
props.title: Number of Unassigned Shards
